document.heading: Veterans Appreciation Scholarship Fund Establishment Act of 2008

history.narrative: Law 17-312, the “Veterans Appreciation Scholarship Fund Establishment Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-27 which was referred to the Committee on Workforce Development and Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 18, 2008, and December 2, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 19, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-612 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-312 became effective on March 20, 2009.
